verbose_text: To distinguish between these two possibilities, lysosomal degradation was blocked by treating cultures with 10 nm bafilomycin-A1 (that targets vacuolar-type H + -ATPase), such that stimulation of autophagy following Tnv-6 treatment would result in a synergistic accumulation of LC3-II By analysis of LC3-II bands in Western blot images [XREF_FIG (b)] using densitometry, an increased LC3-II expression was evident with bafilomycin-A compared to untreated cells (p = 0.03, n = 3), similar to the increase in Tnv-6-treated cells.
